title: Welcome to digital.auto playground for virtual exploration
description: To support shift-level testing for software-defined vehicle (SDV) applications, we have created the digital.auto playground. This is a cloud-based, rapid prototyping environment for new, SDV-enabled features. The prototypes are built against real-world vehicle APIs and can be seamlessly migrated to automotive runtimes, such as Eclipse Velocitas. The playground is open and free to use.

items.title: Overview
items.description: Get an overview of the cloud-based prototyping environment for SDV functions.

items.title: Get Started
items.description: Learn about creating efficient SDV applications, using Python and Vehicle API

items.title: Vehicle Catalog
items.description: Create a model to start building new connected vehicle app prototypes.

items.title: Playground Introduction
items.description: Explore the future of our digital.auto community with Prof. Dirk Slama with digital.auto playground.

items.title: Explore the SDV Guide - Your Complete Software-Defined Vehicle Resource
items.description: Comprehensive SDV Guide covering Software-Defined Vehicle fundamentals through advanced topics.

items.title: Version v2.0 release
items.description: We are pleased to announce the release of Version 2. The previous version remains accessible at https://digitalauto.netlify.app until Jan 17th 2025

items.title: Contribute to playground development
items.description: Join us in developing playground.digital.auto on Eclipse Autowrx - an open platform where developers learn and experiment with software-defined vehicles.
